item.title: Handshaking lemma
item.description: /a.k.a. the Degree Sum Formula/ $$ \sum_{x \in V}{d(x)} = 2 |E| $$ This formula implies that in any [[notes/Mathematics/Discrete Mathematics/Graph Theory/Undirected Graph|undirected graph]], the number of vertices with odd [[notes/Mathematics/Discrete Mathematics/Graph Theory/Degree (Vertex)|degree]] is even.
